results.title: Utilization of an Industry Byproduct, Corymbia maculata Leaves, by Aspergillus terreus to Produce Lovastatin
results.text_hl: Due to its ability to lower @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ levels, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is a leading drug for the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@strokes@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@heart disease@@@: it also lowers the incidence of @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin Improves Cardiac Function through Notch 1 Activation in BALB/c Mice with Chronic Chagas Cardiomyopathy
results.text_hl: Furthermore, several reports suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ activates the Notch pathway after @<m>DISEASE_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@ in cerebral endothelial cells, enhancing blood flow by promoting angiogenesis.
